mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.title, c.view_count, c.cover_image_url, c.file_path, u.username AS author, c.created_time, c.description, c.user_id, c.type, c.status, c.like_count, c.comment_count, c.favorite_count, c.last_modified_time, c.review_notes FROM content c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT content_id, MAX(created_time) AS latest_created_time FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND behavior_type = #{behaviorType} AND is_active = 1 GROUP BY content_id ) latest_ub ON c.content_id = latest_ub.content_id ORDER BY latest_ub.latest_created_time DESC
